Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring a study on naturally occurring retirement communities and the development of a plan to support aging in place
Items.MatterName: Requiring a study on naturally occurring retirement communities and the development of a plan to support aging in place.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign, legislation to lower the age of eligibility for Older Americans Act-supported social services and programs from 60 to 45 years for individuals living with HIV.
Items.MatterName: Lower the age of eligibility for Older Americans Act-supported social services and programs from 60 to 45 years for individuals living with HIV.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of information regarding employment discrimination and older adult workforce programs
Items.MatterName: Provision of information regarding employment discrimination and older adult workforce programs.
